ProjectProfile.ProjectName: Pacer Field Plc — Organic Chia Seed Production & Supply

Organization.Description: Development partner committed to contributing to Ethiopia’s socio-economic development by investing in production and supply of highly valuable agricultural products mainly intended for export markets and to some extent for local supply.

Background.Narrative:
Ethiopia is highly endowed with natural resources. Despite this, the country historically faced economic constraints; however, it has recently been among the fast-growing economies globally. The economy is mainly based on agriculture, alongside observable industrial development. The national strategy recognizes the complementarity between agriculture and industry, aligned with an Agriculture-Led Industry policy. Industrial development is expected to take a leading position in the near future, while agriculture remains a main source of raw materials for industry.
Industrial parks and other economic firms depend on agriculture for raw materials and foreign currency supply. Therefore, strengthening agricultural capacity is essential for sustainable socio-economic development. The government gives strong attention to agriculture and applies incentive systems to committed investors.
Pacer Field plc invests in organic chia seed production primarily for export markets, contributing to foreign currency generation, job creation, and improved quality and productivity of agricultural products for world markets.

StrategicContext.Rationale: Foreign currency generation, raw material supply to industry, and sustainable socio-economic growth
